summary: my first mod, a simple follower wich i will possibly eventually include in a bigger mod i am planning
descriptionHtml:
this is my first mod, a simple follower wich i will possibly eventually include in a bigger mod i am planning. 

---current known bugs---
-Under certain circumstances hamlet seem to be impossible to talk to, might be caused by incompatibility (what could be incompatible wich an npc xD)
-Certain people experience CTD uppon start of the game with this enabled, currently being looked into.
---Install---
just drop the esp in the data folder and tick it in the launcher.

---uninstall---
untick it from the launcher and delete hamlet.esp from your data folder.
author: Dweramond
